distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for go1.14 fixes the following issues:

Go was updated to version 1.14.14 (bsc#1164903).

Security issues fixed:

- CVE-2021-3114: Fixed incorrect operations on the P-224 curve in crypto/elliptic (bsc#1181145).
- CVE-2021-3115: Fixed a potential arbitrary code execution in the build process (bsc#1181146).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: In Go before 1.14.14 and 1.15.x before 1.15.7, crypto/elliptic/p224.go can generate incorrect outputs, related to an underflow of the lowest limb during the final complete reduction in the P-224 field.
notes.title: CVE description

notes.text: Go before 1.14.14 and 1.15.x before 1.15.7 on Windows is vulnerable to Command Injection and remote code execution when using the "go get" command to fetch modules that make use of cgo (for example, cgo can execute a gcc program from an untrusted download).
notes.title: CVE description
